name: Physical Therapy Holdings, Inc.
description: Physical Therapy Holdings, Inc. is a comprehensive provider of outpatient physical therapy services across the United States. Founded in 2015, the company has rapidly established itself as a leader in the rehabilitation sector, focusing on delivering high-quality care to patients with a variety of musculoskeletal conditions. PHYD operates a network of clinics that are equipped with state-of-the-art facilities and staffed by licensed physical therapists who are dedicated to restoring function and improving quality of life for their patients. The company emphasizes a patient-centered approach, tailoring treatment plans to meet the individual needs of each patient. In addition to traditional physical therapy, PHYD offers specialized services such as sports rehabilitation, orthopedic therapy, and post-operative care. The company is committed to advancing the field of physical therapy through ongoing research, education, and the integration of innovative treatment techniques. With a mission to enhance recovery and promote wellness, Physical Therapy Holdings aims to lead the industry in patient satisfaction and clinical outcomes.

seo.meta_title: Physical Therapy Holdings, Inc. | Leading Provider of Rehabilitation Services
seo.meta_description: Explore Physical Therapy Holdings, Inc., a leading provider of outpatient physical therapy services dedicated to enhancing recovery and promoting wellness.

faq.question: What services does Physical Therapy Holdings offer?
faq.answer: Physical Therapy Holdings offers outpatient physical therapy, sports rehabilitation, orthopedic therapy, and post-operative care.

faq.question: Where is Physical Therapy Holdings headquartered?
faq.answer: Physical Therapy Holdings is headquartered in Chicago, Illinois, USA.

faq.question: When was Physical Therapy Holdings founded?
faq.answer: Physical Therapy Holdings was founded in 2015.
